name: moomoo-milk
effect: Used on a party Pokémon : Restores 100 HP.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: Milk with a very high nutrition content. It restores the HP of one Pokémon by 100 points.
flavor_text.platinum: Milk with a very high nutrition content. It restores the HP of one Pokémon by 100 points.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: Milk with a very high nutrition content. It restores the HP of one Pokémon by 100 points.
